SELECT
from dj_core_house_worker w
LEFT JOIN dj_house h ON w.house_id = h.id LEFT JOIN dj_deliver_order o ON o.id = w.business_id LEFT JOIN dj_member_address ma on ma.id=o.address_id
INNER JOIN ( SELECT house_id, MAX(end_date) end_date FROM dj_core_house_flow GROUP BY house_id ) a ON a.house_id = w.house_id
INNER JOIN ( SELECT house_id,create_date FROM dj_core_house_flow_apply WHERE apply_type = 4 AND DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY house_id ) b ON b.house_id = w.house_id
INNER JOIN ( SELECT house_id,MIN(create_date) create_date FROM dj_core_house_flow_apply WHERE apply_type = 4 GROUP BY house_id ) b ON b.house_id = w.house_id AND DATE_FORMAT(b.create_date, '%x年-第%v周' ) = DATE_FORMAT( SYSDATE(), '%x年-第%v周' )
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT house_id, create_date FROM dj_basics_site_memo WHERE type =1 AND DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%x年-第%v周' ) = DATE_FORMAT( SYSDATE(), '%x年-第%v周' ) GROUP BY house_id ) c ON c.house_id = w.house_id
INNER JOIN ( SELECT house_id, COUNT(id) patrol FROM dj_core_house_flow_apply WHERE apply_type = 5 GROUP BY house_id ) fa ON fa.house_id = w.house_id
where w.worker_id = #{workerId} and w.business_id is not null and w.work_type in(1,6)
AND ( CONCAT( h.residential, IFNULL(h.building, '*'), '栋', IFNULL(CONCAT(h.unit, '单元'), ''), IFNULL(h.number, '*'), '号' ) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{nameKey}, '%') OR ma.address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{nameKey}, '%') )
AND w.type = #{type}
AND a.end_date <= CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y-%m-%d'), ' 23:59:59' )
and c.house_id is null
AND fa.patrol < w.patrol
order by w.create_date
order by w.create_date desc

SELECT m.id workerId, m.`name` workerName, m.evaluation_score evaluationScore, IFNULL(o.methods, 0) methods, IFNULL(ROUND(j.juli,2), 99.99) juli FROM `dj_member` m LEFT JOIN ( SELECT hw.worker_id, count(hw.id) methods FROM dj_core_house_worker hw LEFT JOIN dj_core_house_flow hf ON hw.house_id = hf.house_id AND hw.worker_type_id = hf.worker_type_id WHERE hw.work_type IN (1, 6) AND hw.worker_type = 3 AND hf.work_steta NOT IN (1, 2, 6) GROUP BY hw.worker_id ) o ON o.worker_id = m.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT hw.worker_id, MIN(v.juli) juli FROM dj_core_house_worker hw INNER JOIN dj_house h ON h.id = hw.house_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT mv.*, ( st_distance ( point (mv.locationx, mv.locationy), point (#{locationx}, #{locationy}) ) * 111195 / 1000 ) AS juli FROM `dj_house_modeling_village` mv WHERE mv.locationx IS NOT NULL ) v ON v.id = h.village_id WHERE hw.worker_type = 3 GROUP BY hw.worker_id ) j ON j.worker_id = m.id WHERE m.`worker_type` = '3' AND m.`check_type` = '2' And m.auto_order=0 AND m.`real_name_state` = '3' AND m.evaluation_score >= 60

SELECT a.houseName, a.butType, a.workerTypeId, a.houseFlowId, a.createDate, a.type, a.orderType, a.square, a.houseMember, a.workertotal FROM (SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( h.residential, IFNULL(h.building, '*'), '栋', IFNULL(CONCAT(h.unit, '单元'), ''), IFNULL(h.number, '*'), '号' ), a.address ) houseName, '0' butType, f.worker_type_id workerTypeId, f.id houseFlowId, f.create_date createDate, '0' type, '0' orderType, CONCAT( IFNULL(h.square, '***'), 'm²' ) square, IFNULL(m.nick_name, m.`name`) houseMember, f.work_price workertotal FROM `dj_core_house_flow` f INNER JOIN dj_house h ON h.id = f.house_id INNER JOIN dj_member_address a ON a.house_id = f.house_id INNER JOIN dj_member m ON m.id = h.member_id WHERE f.`work_type` = '2' AND f.`state` = '2' AND f.`worker_type_id` = #{workerTypeId} AND f.`city_id` = #{cityId} UNION ALL SELECT a.address houseName, '0' butType, f.worker_type_id workerTypeId, f.id houseFlowId, f.create_date createDate, '1' type, '0' orderType, '' square, a.`name` houseMember, f.total_amount workertotal FROM `dj_deliver_order` f INNER JOIN dj_member_address a ON a.house_id = f.house_id WHERE ( f.worker_id IS NULL OR f.worker_id = '' ) AND f.type = '4' AND f.order_status = '2' AND f.`city_id` = #{cityId} UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT( h.residential, IFNULL(h.building, '*'), '栋', IFNULL(CONCAT(h.unit, '单元'), ''), IFNULL(h.number, '*'), '号' ) houseName, '0' butType, f.worker_type_id workerTypeId, f.id houseFlowId, f.create_date createDate, '2' type, '0' orderType, CONCAT( IFNULL(h.square, '***'), 'm²' ) square, IFNULL(m.nick_name, m.`name`) houseMember, '0' workertotal FROM `dj_maintenance_record` f INNER JOIN dj_house h ON h.id = f.house_id INNER JOIN dj_member m ON m.id = f.member_id WHERE
f.steward_id IS NULL
( f.worker_member_id IS NULL AND f.`worker_type_id` = #{workerTypeId} )
AND h.`city_id` = #{cityId} ) a
a.type = #{type}
ORDER BY a.createDate DESC
